backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, persistent Sky World state, and authorized game actions like initialization and profile access.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for select frontend game and social utility files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling auth, profile setup, tab navigation, audio unlock, and Sky World initialization.
frontend/src/audio/useAudioManager.ts: React hook managing audio context initialization, playback, volume, and mute state.
frontend/src/components/AudioControls.ts: UI component providing a popover with volume slider and mute toggle tied to the audio manager.
frontend/src/components/HudOverlay.tsx: HUD overlay showing timer, collections, pause control, and Qudo boost indicator during gameplay.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity auth and react-query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/PastelPanel.tsx: Styled container panel with a pastel textured background and customizable classes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for creating a user profile with name input and save mutation.
frontend/src/components/SessionSummaryMo: Displays session results and records rewards while updating local progression.
frontend/src/components/ThemeSettingsShe: Sheet UI allowing users to select or override time‑of‑day theme settings.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Defines asset paths, sprite frame layouts, and an image loader utility.
frontend/src/game/GameCanvas.tsx: Main game canvas handling asset loading, input, session updates, rendering, and session summary display.
frontend/src/game/progression.ts: Manages player progression including collections, quests, leveling, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/game/sessionLogic.ts: Defines session state and game loop logic for clouds collecting items, spawning objects, and computing rewards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, storage, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls with React Query for user profiles, world state, and rewards, including mutations and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTelegram.ts: Detects Telegram WebApp availability and exposes share and haptic utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom pastel theme variables with component and utility layers.
frontend/src/lib/deepLinks.ts: Parses and constructs hash-based deep links for navigating app views.
frontend/src/lib/telegramWebApp.ts: Provides helpers to access Telegram WebApp API with a mock fallback when unavailable.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/CosmeticsShopPage.tsx: Renders the cosmetics shop UI, allowing users to browse categories, purchase items, and equip cosmetics with toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/HelpCommandsPage.tsx: Displays an accordion list of bot commands with descriptions for navigating and using Qudo Skyworld.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsPage.tsx: Shows total Qudo earned and recent reward entries, with loading and login states handled via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/SkyWorldPage.tsx: Displays the user's Sky World stats and decorations, including loading and missing-world states.
frontend/src/pages/SocialPage.tsx: Provides friend-code sharing, friend world lookup, and visit functionality with identity checks and toast messaging.
frontend/src/social/friendCodes.ts: Implements simple friend-code generation, validation, share text, and share URL creation utilities.
frontend/src/state/useCosmetics.ts: Defines cosmetic item types, a cosmetics catalog, and a React hook managing currency, purchased items, and equipped cosmetics with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/theme/timeOfDay.ts: Provides time-of-day themed visuals and a hook that updates themes based on real time or a stored override.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash query parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, shadows, animations, and theme settings for the project’s pastel aesthetic.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the game’s concept, requirements, architecture notes, assets, and existing feature definitions.
